tosdr.case: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them

title: If you offer suggestions to the service, they become the owner of the ideas that you give them
quoteText: If You send Us any question, comment, suggestion, enhancement, idea, and other information regarding Jumbo, We will be entitled to use and disclose them without any restriction, whether commercial or not, free-of-charge.
